Package utils.db

Package containing classes needed for database access and mapping

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    Base class for database implementations
    DatabaseConversion
    Converter between data model classes and BSON objects
    DBLayer
    Main database access class This class is called from the data model classes to insert, update or search data classes
    FileStorage
    Access to GridFS for records with attached file data
    FileStorage.FileData
    Inner class used for passing back the filename along with the input stream when retrieving a file.
    MongoDatabase
    Connection to a mongoDB database
    ObjectIdConversion
    Helper functions for converting object ids to string and back
    OrderOperations
    Helper functions for ordered objects
    Schema
    Defines which data model class is stored in which database
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DatabaseConversionException
    Exception throws if conversion between BSON and data model classes fails
    DatabaseException
    Exception thrown on database errors
    LostUpdateException
    Exception is thrown if a database change would cause data to be lost due to concurrent updates
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    NotMaterialized
    Field annotation for fields that should never be stored in the database

Package utils.db Description

Package containing classes needed for database access and mapping
